code: import React,{useState}from'react';import axios from'axios';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const AssessmentForm=()=>{const[answers,setAnswers]=useState([]);const[result,setResult]=useState(null);const handleInputChange=(questionId,value)=>{setAnswers(prev=>{const updated=[...prev];const index=updated.findIndex(a=>a.questionId===questionId);if(index>-1){updated[index].value=value;}else{updated.push({questionId,value});}return updated;});};const handleSubmit=async()=>{try{const response=await axios.post('/assessment/start',{answers});setResult(response.data.assessmentResult);}catch(error){console.error('Error submitting assessment:',error);}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Confined Space Assessment"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{children:"Is the space marked? (Yes/No)"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",onChange:e=>handleInputChange('1',e.target.value)})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"button",onClick:handleSubmit,children:"Submit"})]}),result&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:["Permit Required: ",result.permitRequired?'Yes':'No']})]});};export default AssessmentForm;
